title: Loading
text:
source

download

 download (url, dest)

Download given url into dest (creates it on the way if does not exist)

source


load_ossl

 load_ossl (analytes:Union[str,List[str]],
            dest:pathlib.Path=Path('/home/runner/.geka/data/ossl'))

Load all available OSSL data and filter it by analytes of interest










Type
Default
Details




analytes
typing.Union[str, typing.List[str]]

Using OSSLâ€™s analytes naming conventions


dest
Path
/home/runner/.geka/data/ossl
directory containing the data



Example:

analytes = 'k.ext_usda.a725_cmolc.kg'
df = load_ossl(analytes)

print('df shape: ', df.shape)

Reading & selecting data ...
df shape:  (78804, 9)



df.head()
